title: You work for a shared hosting provider, and your supervisor asks you to disable user scripts to dynamically load PHP extensions using the dl() function. How can you do this? (Choose 2)

choices.a: Set enable_dl to Off in the server's php.ini configuration file.
choices.b: Add dl to the current value of disable_functions in the server's php.ini configuration file.
choices.c: Add dl to the current value of disable_classes in the server's php.ini configuration file.
choices.d: Write a custom function called dl() , save it under the name prepend.inc and then set the auto_prepend_file directive to prepend.inc in php.ini.
